subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley, the recipient of $10 billion in government aid, will not entertain clients or attend a PGA Tour event it sponsors in June amid criticism from lawmakers about banks’ corporate expenses. Morgan Stanley is the main sponsor of the Memorial, June 4-7 in Dublin, Ohio.
